Command *mvemote*
******************

Documentation for the mvemote command in */cmds/wiz/mvemote.c*.

Command
=======

USAGE: ``mvemote <target> <destination>``

Moves (ie renames) the specified soul to the specified destination.

NOTE This is admin-only.
